entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets late this evening and after midnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Ice pellets. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of ice pellets in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
